directions.step:
Boil sugar and water without stirring until syrup spins a thread. Pour very slowly over stiffly beaten egg whites and beat until smooth. Add little cream tarter, amount that will lie on end of knife blade. Allow to stand a few minutes, then spread on banquet wafers and sprinkle with ground nuts. Put in hot oven to brown.
Note: Hot oven is 400 - 450 F.
Source: Mrs. Mabel Rife, Good Hope Grange, Fayette County, OH
From Gemini's MASSIVE MealMaster collection at www.synapse.com/~gemini
